long_description:
As the door opens you see massive towers of computers
that nearly touch the ceiling. Your sensors detect that
the room is nearly 20 degrees hotter than the rest of the
building. There is a loud hum as all of the servers work to
power the technology in the building. There is one central machine
with a monitor and a command prompt. The only text on the screen is:
lsusb?

As you insert the usb drive into the machine, the screen reads:
Downloading encryption key................ETA 1:03
Downloading encryption key................ETA  :36
Downloading encryption key................ETA  :12
Downloading complete..............................

Disabling all Auriga locking mechanisms...........
clean room................................unlocked
assembly room.............................unlocked
server room...............................unlocked
attic.....................................unlocked

The servers all around you are in overdrive. The central terminal reads:
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
....
name: Server Room
short_description: You are in a room filled to the ceiling with computers.
